name: Silken Serenade

After using the Technique, allies attacking enemies in Simulated Universe will always be regarded as attacking their Weakness to enter battle, and their Toughness is reduced regardless of Weakness types. desc:
After using the Technique, gains Silken Serenade. At the start of the next battle, automatically triggers the Skill for #1[i] time(s) without consuming Skill Points.
In Simulated Universe, when Ruan Mei has Silken Serenade, the team actively attacking enemies will always be regarded as attacking their Weakness to enter battle, and this attack can reduce all enemies' Toughness regardless of Weakness types. When breaking Weakness, triggers Weakness Break Effect corresponding to the attacker's Type. For every Blessing in possession up to #4[i] Blessing(s), additionally increases the Toughness-Reducing DMG of this attack by #2[i]%. After breaking an enemy target's Weakness, additionally deals to the enemy target Break DMG equal to #3[i]% of Ruan Mei's Ice Break DMG.
